Hero.description: Professional image editing powered by AI. Crop, resize, adjust colors, remove backgrounds, and enhance your images with cutting-edge technology.

features.title: Powerful AI Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create, edit, and enhance, images with professional-grade tools powered by cutting-edge AI technology

smart_crop.title: Smart Crop & Resize
smart_crop.description: Interactive cropping with aspect ratio constraints and intelligent resizing that preserves image quality across any dimension.

color_adj.title: Color & Light Adjustment
color_adj.description: Professional-grade brightness, contrast, saturation controls with real-time preview and auto-enhance capabilities.

bg_removal.title: AI Background Removal
bg_removal.description: Remove or replace backgrounds instantly using advanced AI that detects complex edges and fine details with precision.

content_editor.title: AI Content Editor
content_editor.description: Edit images with natural language prompts. Remove objects, change elements, or add new content using generative AI.

img_extender.title: Image Extender
img_extender.description: Expand your canvas in any direction with AI-powered generative fill that seamlessly blends new content with existing images.

upscaler.title: AI Upscaler
upscaler.description: Enhance image resolution up to 4x using AI upscaling technology that preserves details and reduces artifacts.

pricing.description: Start free and upgrade when you need more power. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

contact.subtitle: How can we help you today?

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.placeholder: What did you like? Any room for improvement?

suggestion.title: Suggestion
suggestion.placeholder: What features would you like to see?
